titleStmt.title: A compendious discourse on the Eucharist with two appendixes.
titleStmt.author: R. H., 1609-1678.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Abraham Woodhead. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Abraham Woodhead's works appeared either anonymously or under the initials R.H. cf. DNB.
This work appears on reel 994:27 as Wing W3440A, and on reel 1163:17 as Wing W3461 (number cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996)).
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminry Library, New York.
